For over 53 years, George Derby Centre has supported the needs of the Federal Government, qualified veterans, and the community at large. Located in the City of Burnaby area, George Derby Centre was founded by George Derby, a returning WWI veteran. George Derby Centre has a vital place in history and continues to provide support to those in need through innovative services and programs.
